publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 75
ab.l: Č́eb́ar avaz ḱot́uŕuv́č́uǵa Tašḥet́ üśt́uńa miźmor Asafḥa šira byla. Maḥtav b́erajik saja e Teńri maḥtav b́erajik saja da juvuḥ bolsun šemij jomaḥlasynlar tamaša išĺarijni.
Ki alsam esiḿa v́eŕańligiń moʿed juv́ujńuń ḿeń t́uźĺukĺarni t́oŕa et́amiń.
Irirĺar jer da bar olturuv- čulary anyn ḿeń t́uźat́tim baɣanalaryn hamḿeš́a.
Ajtamyn malahajlyḥ et́uv́č́uĺarǵa malaɣajlyḥ et́majim da rašaʿlarɣa ḱot́urmajiź baš.
Ḱot́urmajiź bijikḱa ḿuv́uźĺarijiźni śoźĺamajiź ḱuč́ĺu bojun byla.
Ki t́uv́uĺd́ur qujaš čyɣyšyndan da eńuv́uńd́ań da t́uv́uĺ mid́barda juŕuḿakt́ań ḱot́uŕuĺḿak.
Ki Teńri rast t́oŕači birni juvuz e- t́adir da birni ḱot́uŕadir.
Ki qovuš kibik erkińd́a H-nyn da qyzyl vina tolu qujmaḥ da aɣyzdyradyr bu orundan č́opŕaĺariń sarḥadyrlar ič́adirĺar bar rašaʿlary jerniń.
Da ḿeń anlatyrmyn dunjaɣa dejiń zemer oḥurmyn Teńrisińa Jaʿaqovnun.
Da bar ḿuv́uźĺariń rašaʿlarnyn uvaltyrmyn vaĺe ḱot́uŕuŕurĺar ḿuv́uźĺari rastnyn.
